abstract: Ri Kwang-Hyok (Chosŏn'gŭl: 리광혁, born 17 April 1987) is a North Korean international football player. He current plays for Kyonggongop. He has played in two FIFA World Cup qualifying matches.
comment: Ri Kwang-Hyok (Chosŏn'gŭl: 리광혁, born 17 April 1987) is a North Korean international football player. He current plays for Kyonggongop. He has played in two FIFA World Cup qualifying matches.
